pages.text: The $(d)Entity Detector$() emits a Redstone signal when an entity matching its filter is within its detection area.$(br2)In its GUI you can set the radius in each dimension, if the Detector is inverted or not, and specify what type of entity to detect.
pages.title: Entity Detector

pages.text: You can choose to detect$(li)All Entities$(li)Living Entities$(li)Animals$(li)Monsters$(li)Players$(li)Items$(li)Custom$(br2)When in Custom mode, you can put an $(l:items/entity_filter)Entity Filter$(/l) in the Detector to specify exactly what to detect.
